column1: Every one of them is a traitor to conservative values and I question whether they were ever Republicans to begin with. Endorsing the party of infanticide who wants to strip us of our God-given right to defend ourselves is simply disgusting. Good riddance! https://t.co/x7uTCs4aMT

Dianne and I offer our condolences and prayers for President @realDonaldTrump and family after the loss of his brother Robert last night. May he Rest In Peace.

Yale epidemiologist Dr. Harvey Risch: “When this inexpensive oral medication [hydroxychloroquine] is given very early in the course of illness before the virus has had time to multiply beyond control it has shown to be HIGHLY EFFECTIVE” against COVID-19. https://t.co/imjiGKvYNv

I’m looking forward to joining @VP Mike Pence in Baton Rouge today to discuss reopening Louisiana’s schools in a way that keeps both students and teachers healthy while ensuring our young people are able to receive a good education.

President Trump has AGAIN offered help to the cities where senseless shootings claim the lives of our most cherished. I consider those leaders who refuse federal assistance - that would most definitely save lives - complicit in those murders. They should be held fully accountable
Trump has been tougher on Russia than any other president in recent history: instead of smiles and “reset buttons” like Obama he delivered crippling sanctions and renewed deterrence.

Early and unconfirmed reports of Russian bounties placed on American troops were used by the far-left New York Times in an attempt to embarrass the President. If confirmed I have no doubt President Trump will respond appropriately as this behavior should NEVER be tolerated.

2/2: Abortions nearly always have a fatal outcome for the baby and many times it’s the same for the mother. Our legislature took morally justified action to protect women and give them the best chance of survival after botched procedures.

1/2: The Supreme Court’s decision to strike down Louisiana’s abortion law should have been a clear-cut case for states’ rights. It makes sound medical sense to require anyone performing surgeries - including abortions - to have admitting privileges at a local hospital.

2/2: The same thing is happening with “police reform”-we offered a compromise bill but they killed it. They’ll use anyone as a political football until it’s time to deliver. They are not the party of tolerance inclusion or progress - they’re frauds. https://t.co/EFStizgwB6

1/2: In March of 2018 President Trump offered a deal to extend DACA for so-called Dreamers in exchange for border wall funding - Dems said no. After years of claiming to want to help the Dreamers Pelosi and Schumer sold them out and we haven’t heard a word about them since.

Today's ruling confirms DOJ was completely within its authority to drop the investigation into General Michael Flynn. It was nothing more than another politically-motivated witch hunt by corrupt senior officials at the FBI. DOJ must hold them accountable! https://t.co/Dkag4mFpmj
